comments:
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
	at java.util.AbstractList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source)
	at java.util.AbstractList$Itr.next(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.core.internal.MylarContextManager.handleInteractionEvent(MylarContextManager.java:235)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.core.AbstractRelationshipProvider.incrementInterest(AbstractRelationshipProvider.java:84)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.java.search.AbstractJavaRelationshipProvider.access$0(AbstractJavaRelationshipProvider.java:1)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.java.search.AbstractJavaRelationshipProvider$1.searchCompleted(AbstractJavaRelationshipProvider.java:202)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.java.search.AbstractJavaRelationshipProvider$JavaSearchOperation.notifySearchCompleted(AbstractJavaRelationshipProvider.java:343)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.java.search.AbstractJavaRelationshipProvider$JavaSearchOperation.run(AbstractJavaRelationshipProvider.java:279)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.java.search.AbstractJavaRelationshipProvider$JavaSearchJob.run(AbstractJavaRelationshipProvider.java:250)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:76)

It's not yet clear how this should be handled, and seems like a very rare event.  Probably
triggered by opening a file while active search is incrementing interest.
